contest-event.event-date:
June 7, 1930 D Penzance Contest (First Section)
Penzance Contest (First Section) 10 Test Piece Contest Penzance Contest penzance-contest-first-section
None
Recollections of Auber
Penzance, Cornwall Prizes - 1st £20 and cup, 2nd £15 and shield, 3rd £9. Hymn tune contest - 1st Camborne, 2nd Redruth. 5 bands competed.
Oct. 22, 2013, 8:16 a.m. Dec. 4, 2018, 9:38 a.m.
1 Camborne Town Band A. W. Parker
2 Falmouth Town Thomas Chainey
3 Truro City George Cave
4 Redruth Town R. W. Floyd
5 St. Austell Town Band Unknown
